description: The file is a Python test suite using pytest for testing the SQLiteTemplate class and related project initialization functionality in a software project. It includes fixtures for setup, multiple test cases for verifying project structure, script contents, database creation, and configuration handling.

methods.name: temp_dir()
methods.description: Creates a temporary directory for test outputs and cleans it up after the test.

methods.name: template_dir(temp_dir)
methods.description: Sets up a mock template directory with configuration files and scripts required for testing.

methods.name: project_config(temp_dir)
methods.description: Creates a sample project configuration object for testing.

methods.name: test_sqlite_init_info(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Verifies that obtaining template initialization information works correctly.

methods.name: test_project_initialization(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Tests the project setup process, including file creation and content replacement.

methods.name: test_database_creation(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks that the SQLite database can be created and has the expected structure and data.

methods.name: test_default_database_name(template_dir, temp_dir)
methods.description: Ensures that a default database name is generated when none is explicitly provided.

methods.name: test_post_processing_execution(template_dir, project_config, temp_dir)
methods.description: Verifies that post-processing scripts execute successfully and produce expected side effects.

methods.name: test_config_file_loading(temp_dir)
methods.description: Tests loading and parsing project configuration from a JSON file.

methods.name: test_template_variable_replacement(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Checks that placeholder variables in templates are correctly replaced with project-specific values.

methods.name: test_sqlite_specific_features(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Validates features specific to SQLite, such as no user authentication needed.

methods.name: test_entry_point_url(template_dir, project_config)
methods.description: Ensures the generated entry point URL contains the correct database identifiers.
